Texts.Chs: 氘相对常见，但难以提取。它是制取实验室中*极度*有用的不稳定粒子的必要材料。
Texts.Eng: Deuterium is relatively common, but difficult to extract. It is also necessary for unstable particles which are *extremely* useful in the lab.

Texts.Chs: 浓缩铀有着独一无二的穿甲能力。可以用于制作穿甲金属弹头。
Texts.Eng: Enriched uranium finds itself a unique niche: armor piercing ability when applied to metallic rounds.

Texts.Chs: 相对稀有，但又特别实用的钍矿石将提高你的生存几率以及星际旅行的能力。
Texts.Eng: Relatively rare, but exceptionally useful, Thorium will provide a boost to your survival and ability to travel the stars.

Texts.Chs: 有着比铀稍强的放射性，同样也是极其有效的燃料。当你需要镎矿石时，它就像朋友般那么可靠。
Texts.Eng: Slightly more radioactive than uranium, and also a much more useful source of fuel, Neptunium will be your friend when you need it.

Texts.Chs: 氚是核聚变反应所生成的，而且，通过萃取，将它用于制作氦3是可行的。
Texts.Eng: Tritium is produced by fission reaction, and is a viable means to obtain helium-3 as well, via extraction in a laboratory.

Texts.Chs: 难以置信，但你确实制造了一种全新的放射物。让我们称它为奥创棒，快试试它作为燃料的性能吧！
Texts.Eng: Who knows how this is even possible, but you have created a whole new type of radiation. Let us call it: Ultronium. Check out that fuel capability!
